text: The 2007 Formula 3 Sudamericana season was the 21st Formula 3 Sudamericana season. It began on 24 March 2007, at Autódromo José Carlos Pace in São Paulo and ended on 16 December 2007 also at Autódromo José Carlos Pace in São Paulo. Brazilian driver Clemente de Faria, Jr. won the title. ==Drivers and teams== * All drivers competed in Pirelli-shod, Berta-powered Dallara F301s. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%;" ! Team !
